channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Disease of 1,000 faces shows how science is tackling immunity’s dark side
item.description: It’s one of medicine’s biggest mysteries — why sometimes our immune system attacks our own bodies. Autoimmune diseases affect as many as 50 million Americans and millions more worldwide.

item.title: Most major US airports are among 40 targeted for shutdown flight cuts
Officials scour charred site of Kentucky UPS plane crash for victims and answers
